p: In The DISTRICT COURT of the SECOND JUDICIAL DISTRICT
Holding Terms at Montesano, in, and for the County of Chehalis.
The TERRITORY of WASHINGTON, PLAINTIFF. VS. Andrew Johnson DEFENDANT.} INDICTMENT.

We Andrew Johnson as Principal, and Charles H Byles and T J Shawley as Sureties, acknowledge ourselves to owe and be indebted to the Territory of Washington in the just and full sum of Four Hundred Dollars, lawful money of the United States of America, to be levied of our Goods and Chattels, Lands and Tenements, upon the following conditions:
